subject: new ui + layout
header: feat: new ui + layout
body:
* new component `MathInput` which combines a mathquill input and a
`Keypad`.
* `Keypad` has been re-written to:
  * improve it's layout
  * make it more configurable
* `HorizontalKeypad` has been rewritten to use the new `Keypad`.
footer:
BREAKING CHANGE:
* The ui is quite different now
* Some of the old components are gone (except for HorizontalKeypad which
is retained for backward compatibility).

notes.title: BREAKING CHANGE
notes.text:
* The ui is quite different now
* Some of the old components are gone (except for HorizontalKeypad which
is retained for backward compatibility).

subject: support html markup in TextSelect
header: feat: support html markup in TextSelect
body:
text-select only worked with plain text when rendering because it used
safe rendering. This change now does markup up rendering.

subject: add new prop 'pluginProps'
header: feat: add new prop 'pluginProps'
body:
This prop allows you to make runtime changes that the plugin can make
use of while executing.

> At the moment it's only used to render toolbar buttons, but if needed
we can get the props to pass down to the render methods of each plugin.

subject: Graphing issues and inconsistencies PD-123

footer: BREAKING CHANGE: tools, currentTool, defaultTool and hideLabel should not be used as params anymore, instead, send only toolbarTools, which is an array of strings, where each string should be a valid tool type. eg. ['point', 'line', 'label']

notes.title: BREAKING CHANGE
notes.text: tools, currentTool, defaultTool and hideLabel should not be used as params anymore, instead, send only toolbarTools, which is an array of strings, where each string should be a valid tool type. eg. ['point', 'line', 'label']
